name: Crystal Ball (UltraBend)
description:
Crystal Ball is a procedural game requiring skill and cold blood.

In this game the player has to go through each level to collect crystals that offer extra time to open the exit.
Each level is randomly generated and includes different types of scenery consisting of traps, curves, dead ends, etc...

Crystal Ball is a fun and endless game because each level is unique!

I made this game for my young children so they can develop their skills, but I think it's a good entertainment for passing time during coffee break ;-)

I am very happy to share it with you for free, but if you want to contribute feel free to make a donation!

Enjoy !
